get.summary: Searches for service provider days and all additional information (if requested)

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Optional search string for looking up a record within name and searchterm fields.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited after a specific datetime. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString).

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited after the provided change id. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString).

parameters.name: servicePerformanceDay
parameters.description: Date the service was performed.

parameters.name: personnelNo
parameters.description: Id of the performing unit in the external system - Is only unique togehter with the companyNo.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: If set to true the service provider day is returned with all related additional information.

example.supplierNote: Der Lieferant hat jedes Jahr im Frühsommer eine Aktion auf alle Metallwaren am laufen...
example.remarkExternal: Bitte die Liefertermine direkt bestätigen nach der Anfrage.
example.openingText: Sie erhalten folgende Bestellung. Bitte überprüfen Sie die Positionen und bestätigen Sie uns die Lieferung mittels Auftragsbestätigung.
example.footerText: Bitte geben Sie uns evtl. Preisänderungen schriftlich unter der Mailadresse purchase@memor.ch an. Besten Dank.

serviceRecordingServiceProviderDay.title: ServiceProviderDay
serviceRecordingServiceProviderDay.description: Represents a service provider day entry.

targetHours.description: The amount of hours that should be spent on this.

presenceHours.description: Hours the service provider was present.

allowancesHours.description: Hours that are relevant for allowences.

breakRuleViolated.description: A work hour rule was violated.

approved.description: The service provider day was approved by the authorized user.

dayValid.description: The record was checked by all rules and is valid.

approvalUser.description: Name of the reviewing authority that approved the record.

approvalDate.description: Date the reviewing authority approved the record.

dayError.description: List of all reasons why the recoed could not be validated successfully.
dayError.example: Abwesenheitszeit darf nicht grösser als die Sollzeit sein.

relevantChangeUser.description: Name of user who changed relevant information of the record other than the service provider.

relevantChangeDate.description: Date someone changed relevant information of the record other than the service provider.

overlapHours.description: Hours overlapping with other service provider day.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

personnelNo.description: Id of the human service provider in the external system.

machineNo.description: Id of the machine service provider in the external system.

serviceProviderDate.description: Day on which the service was provided.

orderNo.description: The OrderNo identifies the order to be booked in accounting. This is the actual order no of the order.

period.description:
Year and month the service was provided
Format YYYYMM (e.g. 202401).

quantity.description: Amount of hours to get work done.

c291ServiceRecordStatus.description:
State of the service entry
10 - Provisorisch                - Provisional
20 - Erfasst                     - Recorded
25 - Nicht verrechnungsbereit    - Not ready for billing
30 - Verrechnungsbereit          - Ready for billing
40 - Verrechnet                  - Billed
45 - Keine Verrechnung           - No billing.

locked.description: The service entry is locked for change.

machineServiceProviderDayId.description: Id des service provider day of the machine.

guid.description: Unique global external Id to identify the record .

originId.description: Id of the system of origin.

c577OriginStatus.description:
Status of the origin
100 - nicht freigegeben     - not approved 
200 - teilweise freigegeben - partially approved
500 - freigegeben           - approved.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

shortDescription.description: Short identifier/abbreviation/acronym of the service provider.

description.description: Full decription / Name of the service provider.

serviceCompleted.description: Indicates if the service has been completed.

allowEditingInClosedPeriod.description: Indicates if the service provider can be edited even if the period is closed.

externalId.description: Id of the service provider in the external system.

c286ServiceProviderType.description:
Type of the service provider
1 - Mitarbeiter - Employees
2 - Maschinen   - Machines
3 - Kleingeräte - Small devices
5 - Allgemein   - Universal.

department.description: Department the service provider is assigned to.

standardServiceType.description: Default servie type of the service provider .

originid.description: Id of the system of origin the order.

serviceProviderDayId.description: Id of the service provider day.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

personnelNo.description: Id of the person/(human) service provider in the external system.

machineNo.description: Id of the machine service provider in the external system.

description.description: Discribes the details of the allowance.

orderNo.description: The OrderNo identifies the order to be booked in accounting. This is the actual order no of the order.

percentage.description: Percentage rate of base amount being compensated.

amount.description:
Actual amount being compensated
base (declared) 8h
percentage 50%
amount (compensated) 4h.

apply.description: As all possible allowances are checked and calulated for all service provider days this flag declares if this specific allowance is relevant.

locked.description: The dataset is locked for change.

exclude.description: The allowence is not being granted even if would apply.

period.description:
Year and month the service was provided
Format YYYYMM (e.g. 202401).

originId.description: Id of the system of origin.

description.description: Discribes the details of the allowance.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

active.description: usually the API will respond with this structure, when the maintenance window is active and the window has started.

externalId.description: Id of the allowance definition in the external system.

presenceTimeId.description: Unique identifier of the presence time dataset.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

serviceProviderDayId.description: Identifier to the service provider day.

personnelNo.description: Id of the person/(human) service provider in the external system.

hours.description: Hours the service provider was present.

timeFrom.description: Time the service provider started work.

timeUntil.description: Time the service provider ended work.

locked.description: The presence time record is locked for all but the origin system.

originId.description: Id of the system of origin.

serviceProviderType.description:
Type of the service provider
 1 - Mitarbeiter - Employees
 2 - Maschinen   - Machines
 3 - Kleingeräte - Small devices
 5 - Allgemein   - Universal.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

personnelNo.description: Id of the person/(human) service provider in the external system.

holiday.description: Is the absence due to a holiday?.

c575TimePeriod.description:
Predefined time periods
20 - Ganzer Tag - entire day
40 - Vormittag - Morning
60 - Nachmittag - Afternoon.

absenceApplicationId.description: Indenties the application for this absence.

locked.description: This absence is locked for change.

originId.description: Id of the system of origin.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

caccEntryNo.description: Unique identifier of entry in combination with the CompanyNo.

orderNo.description: The OrderNo identifies the order to be booked in accounting. This is the actual order no of the order.

costType.description: Type that the item is booked in.

budgetActual.description: B => Budget / P => Plan / I => Ist / K => Ker.

originId.description: Id of the system of origin the order.

voucherNo.description: Booking no / receipt no / voucher no on origin system.

amountBSC.description: Amount of the voucher in the given currency.

amount.description: Amount in the unit set by CostType.

bpAddrID.description: performis Address ID - This ID uniquely identifies an address in performis. For example, ID \"629\" for address \"Infosystem AG, Wil\". To identify the address, either the performis address ID (BpAddrID) or the ID of the external system (ExternalBpAddrID) is required.

externalBPEmployeeID.description: Third-Party ID of employee, which is the selected recipient of the selected type of document.

origin.description: Origin of the business partner, name of the third-party system. Business partners and addresses with an origin can't be edited in performis.

active.description: usually the API will respond with this structure, when the maintenance window is active and the window has started.

isLocked.description: Entry can only be modified by creator.

c2466SupplierRating.description: User code to set the rating of the supplier.

ourCustomerNo.description: Our customer identification with the supplier.

orderPrintCopies.description: Number of copies of the order to ne printed.

orderPrintPrices.description: Are the prices printed on the order.

c2462OrderType.description: Type of order, by post / by e-mail / by telephone / by fax / Internet / etc.

confirmationPeriod.description: Number of days added to order date until reminder for confiramation date.

reminderPeriodDispatchAdvice.description: Number of days (+confirmationPeriod) added to order date until reminder for confiramation.

reminderPeriodDelivery.description: Number of days added to promissed delivery date until reminder for delivery.

purchaseCostsInPercentage.description: Expected percentage of procurement costs for the supplier invoice.

taxSystem.description: Country of tax system as ISO code.

c2463IncoTermsFreightType.description:
Incoterms define the responsibilities of exporters and importers in the arrangement of shipments and the transfer of liability involved at various stages of the transaction.
Freight type e.g. lorry, post, truck, courier, collection etc.

c2467IncoTerms.description: Incoterms define the responsibilities of exporters and importers in the arrangement of shipments and the transfer of liability involved at various stages of the transaction.

deliveryDuration.description: Delivery time for order proposal calculations and warning in the order programme (e.g. 5 days delivery time no longer works for tomorrow) Specification in whole days.

deliveryDays.description: Delivery days from dropdown box (multiselect) for delivery date proposal, default Monday - Friday checked. Bitmap, starting with Monday (1st digit) 0=not selected, 1=selected.

invoiceBpAddrID.description: performis Address ID - This ID uniquely identifies an address in performis. For example, ID \"629\" for address \"Infosystem AG, Wil\". To identify the address, either the performis address ID (BpAddrID) or the ID of the external system (ExternalBpAddrID) is required.

invoiceExternalBpAddrID.description: Third-Party ID of employee, which is the selected recipient of the selected type of document.

pickupBpAddrID.description: performis Address ID - This ID uniquely identifies an address in performis. For example, ID \"629\" for address \"Infosystem AG, Wil\". To identify the address, either the performis address ID (BpAddrID) or the ID of the external system (ExternalBpAddrID) is required.

pickupExternalBpAddrID.description: Third-Party ID of employee, which is the selected recipient of the selected type of document.

notes.example: Every year in early summer, the supplier runs a promotion on all metal goods. Internal task recorded in the info centre so that we can place a bulk order for screws and fasteners.

origin.description: The system of origin the order.

active.description: usually the API will respond with this structure, when the maintenance window is active and the window has started.

purchaseOrderNo.description: Generated order number according to code 2451.

companyNo.description: Company no for which the codevalue is available. 0 = all companies.

c2462PurchaseOrderType.description: How was the order placed? Post, eMail,...

c2452PurchaseOrderState.description: State of the order e.g. recorded, placed, partially delivered,...

isPurchaseOrderSent.description: Flag if order was been sent.

deliveryDatePlanned.description: Desired cross-item delivery date, if no confirmation, this is written to the delivery date.

priceDate.description: Date of the price information the purchase is based on.

desadvDatePlanned.description: Date the supplier should confirm the order.

c2464DeliveryLocation.description: Where is the purchase delivered? Delivery address, pickup addess,...

c2463FreightType.description: How is the purchase delivered? Pick up, lorry, post,...

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate used for purchase when not in own currency.

c2467Incoterm.description: INCO terms applying for this order.

incotermPlace.description: Agreed place of delivery where the risk passes from the seller to the buyer.

plantDeliveryDateRequested.description: Desired cross-item delivery date to a plant, if no confirmation, this is written to the delivery date.

plantDeliveryDate.description: Confirmed cross-item delivery date to a plant.

supplierBpAddrId.description: Unique identifier of the supplier address.

deliveryBpId.description: Unique identifier of the shipping partner e.g. courier, carrier,...

deliveryBpAddrId.description: Unique identifier of the shipping partner address.

supplierNote.example: Every year in early summer, the supplier runs a promotion on all metal goods. Internal task recorded in the info centre so that we can place a bulk order for screws and fasteners.

remarkInternal.example: Promised delivery dates are never met.

remarkExternal.description: Remarks added to the supplier order.
remarkExternal.example: Please let us know the delivery dates in more detail.

openingText.example: You have received the following order. Please check the items and confirm the delivery by means of an order confirmation.

footerText.description: Final remarks concerning the order put in the footer of the order.
footerText.example: Please inform us of any price changes in writing at the e-mail address purchase@memor.ch. Thank you very much.

yourRef.description: Reference that helps reidentify the purchase.

posnr.description: Item number. Format and conditions via company settings.

c2455PositionType.description:
Type of the position
1: article
2: amount
3: text.

c2458Preisart.description:
Pricetype
1: Normal price
2: Special offer price.

c2456DistributionKey.description:
Positions are split
1: manually
2: by amount
3: by quantity.

c23Mvat.description: Type of applied tax (vat, input tax).

c2463FreightType.description: How is the purchase delivered? Pick up, lorry, post,...

c2459PriceOrigin.description:
Origin of the price information
1: Set manually
2: Supplier article price
3: Supplier article scale price
4: Current materials purchase price.

assetNo.description: Identifier of the asset the order is placed for.

costCenterNo.description: Cost center responsible for the order.

costUnitNo.description: Cost unit responsible for the order.

orderNo.description: Identifier of the order sent set by the ordering system.

deliveryDateRequested.description: Was a request to commit to a delivery date sent to the supplier?.

plantDeliveryDateRequested.description: Was a request to commit to a delivery date to the plant sent to the supplier?.

plantDeliveryDate.description: Commited delivery date to plant by supplier.

materialBooking.description: Shows if the item is a physical product or, for example, a service.

countryOfOrigin.description: ISO code of country of origin.

desadvDate.description: Date the supplier confirmed the order.

desadvSupplierDate.description: Date the supplier should confirm the order.

fullyChargedBool.description: Indicates whether the purchase position has been fully booked or whether it is still partially open.

netAmount.description: Net amount (gross - tax) of the order.

taxAmount.description: Amount of taxes for the order.

printBool.description: Determines whether an item is printed on the order document or not, default = 1.

active.description: usually the API will respond with this structure, when the maintenance window is active and the window has started.

origin.description: The system of origin the order.

externalArticleId.description: Id of the article in the external system.

companyNo.description: The CompanyNo identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

c459ArticleGroup.description: Id of the group or category of the product.

countryOfOrigin.description: ISO code of the coutry of origin.

storageLocation.description: Identifier of the delivering storage location.

storagePlace.description: Identifier of the delivering storage place.

c28UnitLengths.description: Unit code of length, width, height.

c408UnitType.description: Type or category of the unit. Is it a weight, a time span, a surface area,...

c28Unit.description: Target unit. The unit the value is converted into.

coefficientUnitTypeUnit.description: Amount in the unit set as standard on the article.

taxSystem.description: Country of tax system as ISO code.

description.description: Full description in the given language.

shortDescription.description: Short description in the given language.

priceId.description: Supplier identifier of the article price.

origin.description: The system of origin the order.

externalPriceId.description: Indentificaion of the article price in the external system.

externalArticleId.description: Id of the article in the external system.

c407PriceType.description: Type of price (standard, avarage, last purchase price).

validFrom.description: Date from which the price entry is valid.

price.description: Unit price in the given currency.

deliveryNoteNo.description: Unique internal identifier of the delivery note.

externalDeliveryNoteNo.description: Unique identifier of the delivery note given by the supplier.

c412EntryType.description: Trigger of teh delivery note (purchase, retuning itmes,...).

deliveryDate.description: Date of the delivery, usally the creation date of the delivery note.

companyNo.description: Company no for which the codevalue is available. 0 = all companies.

storageLocationFrom.description: Identifier of the delivering storage location.

storageLocationTo.description: Identifier of the receiving storage location.

orderNo.description: Our order number ussed when sending the purchase.

costCenterNo.description: Cost center responsible for the order.

costUnitNo.description: Cost unit responsible for the order.

deliveryNotePos.description: Sequence number of articles on the delivery note.

orderNoPos.description: Position of article on the placed order.

amount.description: Amount of the given article in the given position.

storageLocationFrom.description: Identifier of the delivering storage location.

storagePlaceFrom.description: Identifier of the delivering storage place.

storageLocationTo.description: Identifier of the receiving storage location.

storagePlaceTo.description: Identifier of the receiving storage place.

companyNo.description: Company no for which the codevalue is available. 0 = all companies.

text.description: Description or title of the codevalue.

shorttext.description: Short-description or title of the codevalue.

attributeSetId.description: performis internal of attribute set Id.

attributSetDescription.description: Description / Title of the attribute set.

example1.title: Sample Title
example1.detail: This is a generic message to provide a sample return of how a message may be returned.

maintenanceWindow.title: MaintenanceWindow
maintenanceWindow.description: information structure for active maintenance windows.

active.description: usually the API will respond with this structure, when the maintenance window is active and the window has started.

clientStartAllowed.description: defines wether or not clients may continue to work while the maintenance window applies.
